chunk_text: Coming from the Jubilee Vineyard in the Eola-Amity Hills AVA, let this lovely pink wine dance across your tongue as you celebrate every day. This etherial sparkling wine could quite possibly be the best part of 2020! Stainless Steel aged, Our Sparkling Rosé of Dolcetto begins with a vibrant bouquet of sweet florals, wild berries and fresh fruit on the nose. Finishing with developed structure and dry palate that features notes of white mulberry and delicate spices.
